function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of an unvalidated test method","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of anti-viral coating efficacy","Mitigation":"Conduct validation studies to ensure the reliability of the test method","Technologies":"Validation studies, standardization of test methods","People":"Researchers, developers, manufacturers","Owner":"Research and development team"},{"Description":"Potential cross-contamination during testing","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the coating's effectiveness due to contamination","Mitigation":"Implement strict sterilization protocols and control measures during testing","Technologies":"Sterilization equipment, controlled environment chambers","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Quality control team"},{"Description":"Inadequate follow-up period after coating application","Impact":"Failure to capture long-term efficacy of the anti-viral coating","Mitigation":"Extend the follow-up period to assess coating durability over time","Technologies":"Long-term stability testing, accelerated aging studies","People":"Researchers, quality assurance team","Owner":"Quality control and R&D teams"}]}
